channel.title: Pking server!
channel.description:
[code][QUOTE=Defiled-X;3871648]Sup, First of all before you flame/cry "leech" etc. I barely did anything to this base. Added a few interfaces/fixed some bugs etc. I take no credit for this. 100% Credits to whoever made it. Think its deception based but idk. I'm using a free-hosting account cause I rather not pay for a server I have done 0 work on. If by some random miracle I get a decent player base (Which will most likely not happen), I'll make it paid hosting. For now there is one pk zone. Home. Yeah that's how good it is :S. I was going to put a decent amount of effort into this but I found better stuff to do. So If this goes well i'll see what I can do. Now I just want to host a server that is just pking and nothing else. So here it is.
Anyways start the hating/faming/do whatever you guys do. I pretty much set you all up for the best hate thread. Enjoy
[SIZE=5][URL=http://www.cdpk.x10.mx/?234369e8]Play Now[/URL] [/SIZE] Yes the site is terrible. So lol away.
So if you are bored or whatever. Play it or don't. Doesn't matter to me. [SPOILER=Features] Instant Switching Castle Wars Center Home Entire Pk World- lol Custom My profile interface Pk Tab Spawn Good Combat - Or Bad what do i know Hand Cannon Pk Token Eco - No more pk points[/CODE][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Media ]Here are some shitty pics i took and a video. [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/aazwip/6]Combat Video[/URL]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2yjr9j4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2nkt2za.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/30kbrc9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2coiiox.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2iqbofc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/28wf87q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1zy7eqh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/mloxd.png[/img][/SPOILER][/QUOTE]

item.title: Pking server!
item.dc:creator: @yellowtopk yellowtopk
item.description:
@yellowtopk wrote:

[code][QUOTE=Defiled-X;3871648]Sup, First of all before you flame/cry “leech” etc. I barely did anything to this base. Added a few interfaces/fixed some bugs etc.
I take no credit for this. 100% Credits to whoever made it. Think its deception based but idk. I’m using a free-hosting account cause I rather not pay for a server I have done 0 work on. If by some random miracle I get a decent player base (Which will most likely not happen), I’ll make it paid hosting.
For now there is one pk zone. Home. Yeah that’s how good it is :S. I was going to put a decent amount of effort into this but I found better stuff to do. So If this goes well i’ll see what I can do.
Now I just want to host a server that is just pking and nothing else. So here it is.

Anyways start the hating/faming/do whatever you guys do. I pretty much set you all up for the best hate thread. Enjoy

[SIZE=5]Play Now
[/SIZE]
Yes the site is terrible. So lol away.

So if you are bored or whatever. Play it or don’t. Doesn’t matter to me.
[SPOILER=Features]
Instant Switching
Castle Wars Center Home
Entire Pk World- lol
Custom My profile interface
Pk Tab
Spawn
Good Combat - Or Bad what do i know
Hand Cannon
Pk Token Eco - No more pk points[/CODE][/SPOILER]
